entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET Hot Reload concept of Reloadable Types needs to be added to capabilities check #59118
  • Error 0x80041FEB or text mode when auto-opening editorconfig created with Add > New EditorConfig #59114
  • Unable to open .editorconfig files #59113
  • VsCrash when trying to create . EditorConfig #59112
  • Ensure AbstractFlowPass<,> is always constructed with a non-null CSharpCompilation instance #59111
  • 'Simplify new expression (IDE0090)' should arguably _not_ be encouraged #59119
  • /errorlog should handle valid directory/file names #59110
  • Match Folder and Namespace is not documented. #59103
  • RE0001 should be moved to Analyzers layer #59101
  • EditorConfig UI: Location column doesn't refresh #59099
  • "Operator placement when wrapping" should belong to code-style tab #59098
  • C# style analyzer: invoke statics from the type on which they're declared #59094
  • NullReferenceException in AbstractFlowPass evaluating local function with switch statement in EE #59093

Closed

  • Add analyzer/code fix for target-typed new expressions #46700
    Backlog
  • Typing `///` in top-level statements inserts a documentation comment template #59081
  • Creating a new C# class from item template is missing a space between the access modifier and 'class' keyword #58974
    17.2.P1
  • InvalidCastException from DefiniteAssignmentPass during extract method analysis #57428
    17.1
  • Code cleanup supports editorconfig #58087
    Backlog
  • Fix parameter doc completion on primary constructors #59095

PullRequests

Created

  • Support declaring and binding to methods with `params Span<T>` #59123
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge the interpolated end tokens into a single token #59122
    Area-Compilers
  • Make CompletionOptions global #59117
    Area-IDE
  • Fix 'hasStaticConstructor' check in MethodCompiler #59116
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert "Adjust reflection based code in VisualStudioDiagnosticAnalyzerProvide…" #59115
    Area-Analyzers
  • [semi-auto-props]: Minor refactoring #59109
    Area-Compilers
  • Update paths in `.vscode/launch.json` due to TFM changes #59108
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Add note about redirection for documenting IDExxxx #59107
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • add all analyzers that are configured via editorconfig to code cleanup #59106
    Area-IDE
  • Refactor IDE0003 (Qualify 'this'/'Me') #59102
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Go To Implementation show metadata results #59100
    Area-IDE
  • More fault handling cleanup #59097
    Area-IDE
  • Remove dependency on options from IDiagnosticService #59096
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Format document after each provider #59091
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add external access to stacktrace APIs for Unit Testing #58082
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Avoid assuming containing assembly is from source in DefiniteAssignment #59069
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Remove dependency on EditorFeatures from Remote.ServiceHub project #59059
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Insert documentation comments only on supported declarations #59084
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #59092
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Json parsing #42864
    Area-IDE, Need Design Review
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #59124
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [Draft] Don't block completion for items from unimported namespaces #59045
    Area-IDE
  • Support params Span<T> #57078
    Area-Compilers
  • Update StreamJsonRpc #59073
    Area-Infrastructure
  • SignatureHelp: guess best overload for incomplete invocations #31843
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Backlog
  • Switch liveshare to use LSP pull diagnostics and cleanup server name usages #57596
    Area-IDE, LSP, UX Review Not Required
  • Fix Roslyn Diagnostic Window and add Workspace panel #59035
    Area-IDE
  • Integration test options #58744
    Area-IDE
  • Function pointer calling convention IDE support #59062
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Filter cancellation exceptions in generator driver #58843
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.2
  • Apply source-build patches #58727
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Razor snippets #58857
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • List patterns: Recreate the decision dag for lowering #59019
    Area-Compilers
  • EditorConfig UI help link #54623
    Area-IDE
  • Remove extra logic to see if users are squatting on keywords #59086
    Area-IDE
  • Use record param docs as property summary docs #58960
    Area-Compilers
  • AddImportPlacementOptions #59028
    Area-IDE
  • Move global options to EditorFeature layer #59071
    Area-IDE
  • Support declaration and emit of `required` members in source #58507
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Make sure Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Collections builds with net6.0 #57665
    Area-IDE
